name: search_doctor_by_specialization
description: Finds doctors by specialization. IMPORTANT: Convert input to the SINGULAR PRACTITIONER TITLE (e.g., 'Cardiologist' instead of 'Cardiology').

specialization.description: The specialization to search for (e.g., Cardiologist, Dermatologist)

name: search_doctor_by_name
description: Returns doctor details whose name matches the given input.

name: search_clinic_by_city
description: Finds clinics in a given city.

name: search_appointments_by_patient
description: Retrieves a list of upcoming and past appointments for the currently logged-in patient.

name: get_doctor_schedule
description: Retrieves the schedule of appointments (patients, times, status) for the currently logged-in DOCTOR.

name: cancel_appointment_by_patient
description: Cancels a specific appointment. Requires the appointment ID (integer) found in the user's appointment list.

appointment_id.description: The ID of the appointment to cancel

name: complete_appointment_by_doctor
description: Complete a specific appointment. Requires the appointment ID (integer) found in the user's (i.e. doctor's) appointment list.

appointment_id.description: The ID of the appointment to complete

name: generate_slots_by_doctor
description: Generate a new availability slot for the doctor.

date.description: The date for the slot in DD-MM-YYYY format

time.description: The time for the slot in HH:MM format

n_slots.description: Total capacity (number of patients) for this slot

name: book_appointment_by_patient
description: Book a specific appointment slot. Requires the slot ID.

slot_id.description: The ID of the available slot to book

name: get_available_slots
description: Returns a list of AVAILABLE (unbooked) slots for a specific doctor. Use this when a user wants to book an appointment.

doctor_id.description: The ID of the doctor to fetch slots for.
